# Ironbeard (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 19

This spell causes a brushy beard of stiff iron to erupt from the face of a willing target. The *ironbeard* grants a +1 armor bonus to AC, and this bonus stacks with any armor worn by the creature. The *ironbeard* may also be used as a weapon equivalent to [[Iron, Cold|cold iron]] armor spikes. The *ironbeard* makes it difficult to speak, so any spellcasting with a verbal component has a 20% spell failure chance.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
